item.title: Deploying
item.description: Intro If you want to install kubernetes on anything but your local machine, but have never used kubernetes… stop. There are countless technologies which may be used to deploy Kubernetes in all sorts of clouds and on-premise setups. People get stuck on the installation, and the resulting kubernetes clusters are often divergent from what kubernetes was meant to be. Worse yet, a novice may not notice. For example, on-premise deployments of kubernetes, given the constraints of a corporate datacenter, may be missing persistent storage and loadbalancers which most applications built for kubernetes typically depend on.
